titles.title: Lord, I Have Shut the Door

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, I have shut the door, Speak now the word Which in the din and throng Could not be heard; Hushed now my inner heart, Whisper Thy will, While I have come apart, While all is still.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord, I have shut the door, Here do I bow; Speak, for my soul attent Turns to Thee now. Rebuke Thou what is vain, Counsel my soul, Thy holy will reveal, My will control.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In this blest quietness Clamorings cease; Here in Thy presence dwells Infinite peace; Yonder, the strife and cry, Yonder, the sin: Lord, I have shut the door, Thou art within.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lord, I have shut the door, Strengthen my heart; Yonder awaits the task-- I share apart. Only through grace bestowed May I be true; Here, while alone with Thee, My strength renew.
